author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Rare Roast Beef & Horseradish Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rare Roast Beef & Horseradish Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 150g rare roast beef, thinly sliced, fat removed

recipeInstructions.text: Spread 8 slices of medium sliced bread and spread with softened butter. Mix 2 tbsp mayonnaise, 1 tbsp Dijon mustard, and 1 tbsp horseradish cream. Spread 4 slices of bread with horseradish cream and top with thinly sliced (fat removed) rare roast beef. Top with the remaining 4 slices. Cut off the crusts and discard. Cut into 6 mini sandwiches to serve.
